thread.title: Customer Mary Mc Grath
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Customer Mary Mc Grath

author: Customer Mary Mc Grath
title: Customer Mary Mc Grath
text: I am a personal and online shopper with McElhinneys and they new fail me both with courtesy of staff while in the shop and speed of delivery with my online orders. I have no complaints I love this store .
